author: gates
msg: PIG-80: In a number of places stack trace information was being lost byan exception being caught, and a different exception then thrown.  All those locations have been changed so that the new exception now wraps the old.

msg: added test cases that we can add expectations after the messages arrive

author: slaws
msg: An itest related to this JIRA where two WSDL share the same namespace and subsequent WSDL and XSD processing doesn't work properly.
